title: Holidays & Events: Labor Thanksgiving Day (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Labor Thanksgiving Day subcategory within Holidays & Events. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Labour Thanksgiving Day is the day for rewarding daily hard work.
cards.romaji: Kinro kansha no hi wa, hibi no kinro o negirau hi desu.
cards.japanese: 勤労感謝の日は、日々の勤労をねぎらう日です。
